Ian Borges

I designed Ian's personal brand and website. He needed a light and minimalistic brand that represents his spirit of passion and adventure as well as his nomad and balanced way of life. He is a lifestyle coach that helps you live a freedom and meaningful life.

I created a visual identity that translates his characteristics into typography and colours. The graphics I used also represents his freedom style and a more tailored/unique way of life.

For more details, visit Ian Borges's website here.
